name: Eden's Expanse
description: Eden’s Expanse is a single-player space exploration game that places the player as a low level employee for the Nozama Corporation, an asteroid mining and frigate company run by Beff Jezos. The player lives on Eden, a space-city built by Nozama, and is tasked with traversing around company-owned space, mining materials from asteroids to trade for company credit to purchase necessities at the company store. Workers’ tasks are enforced by company-owned mining ships that don’t have outward facing windows so visualization can only come from company-owned satellites for ‘the workers’ own protection.’ But that all changes when a glitch in the system gives the player a whole new view.
